review: This product does not work through my Onkyo TX-NR3100 stereo receiver.  ChromeCast does.  Technical support said that it will not work with the HDMI Port on the receiver.  The Fire Stick would have to be plugged into the tv and then I would have to run an optical cable out to the receiver for sound or use the TV speakers.  I would have to use 2 remotes to and change settings on the receiver and the TV to make that happen and change them back to watch cable /dvr or Blu-ray.  Too much effort, Chromecast works fine through the HDMI port on the receiver.  If I want to watch Fire TV I will just plug my laptop into the tv.
